description: This file is a PHP source file for a web-based port management rule editing interface. It includes server-side PHP code for processing port management rules and client-side JavaScript for UI interactions, validation, and AJAX communication.

methods.name: initPmFields
methods.description: Initializes form fields with existing rule data if available.

methods.name: initConnDevTable
methods.description: Populates the connected devices table based on the current device array.

methods.name: initValidation
methods.description: Sets up form validation rules for IP range, port, and application name inputs.

methods.name: validateIpRange
methods.description: Validates whether the IP range is within allowed subnets and correctly ordered.

methods.name: onsave
methods.description: Collects form data, validates IP ranges, and submits port management rule to server via AJAX.

methods.name: addSelectedIp
methods.description: Adds the selected connected device's IP address to the form fields.

methods.name: onRefreshConnectedDev
methods.description: Refreshes the list of connected devices via AJAX.
